articles.description: Volatility spiked and climbed above the 16 mark, which can create discomfort for the bulls in coming days. The India VIX, the fear index, rose 5.22 percent to 16.02 from 15.22 levels

articles.description: A small satellite that will inspect a discarded rocket body in orbit lifted off Sunday/Monday on a mission to develop techniques for removing space debris. The satellite built by Japan-based Astroscal

articles.title: The Mysterious 280-Million-Year-Old Fossil That Fooled Scientists for Decades - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Paleontological analysis shows renowned fossil thought to show soft tissue preservation is in fact just paint. A 280-million-year-old fossil that has baffled researchers for decades has been shown to be, in part, a forgery following new examination of the rem…
